New Records: India have won seven games out of seven
South Africa have won eight games out of eight
Key Match Events: England collapsed, losing 9 wickets for 25 runs
India's spinners took 6 wickets, including 3 for Axar Patel
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 12 runs
Pre-Game Insights: India and South Africa are the two best teams in the tournament, both unbeaten
Virat Kohli's form has been a concern for India
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma said it was a'very satisfying' win for India
Jos Buttler said India outplayed England and deserved their win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a sticky wicket
India's spinners were lethal, taking 6 wickets
England's batting was one of their horror shows, with only Buttler and Brook making it to 20 balls
Others: The final will be between India and South Africa
England's captaincy and team selection were questioned after the loss
